Most of the entries include a number of typical word combinations for the entry word, which illustrate its semantic nuances and present the user with the most widespread uses of the word in a ready-made form.
name: dad04541-5502-5856-a2a7-70fbf43168e5
notes: 1984–1994 ilmunud 4-köitelise „Vene-eesti sõnaraamatu“ parandatud versioon. Sisaldab üldkeele kõrval hulganisti oskussõnavara ja fraseoloogiat.

The entry list of the dictionary contains ca 74,000 words. Most of the entries include a number of typical word combinations for the entry word, which illustrate its semantic nuances and present the user with the most widespread uses of the word in a ready-made form.
title: Vene-eesti sõnaraamat
